description: Erection of single storey rear extension (4.46m in depth, maximum height of 3.33m and eaves height of 3.33m)
decision_conditions: It is considered that, on the balance of probability, the proposed single storey rear extension would extend beyond a wall forming a side elevation of the original dwellinghouse, and would have a width greater than half the width of the original dwellinghouse, in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (j) (iii), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

The height of the eaves of the proposed single storey rear extension would exceed 3m in conflict with Paragraph A.1 (i), of Class A, part 1, Schedule 2 of the Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).

Notwithstanding the submitted information regarding the proposed materials, the applicant has failed to indicate that the materials used in any exterior work of the proposed development would be of a similar appearance to those used in the construction of the exterior of the existing dwellinghouse, in conflict with Condition A.3 (a) of Schedule 2, Part 1, Class A of The Town and Country Planning (General Permitted Development) (England) Order 2015 (as amended).
